name: A Mama's Love
description:
Made in 14 days for My First Game Jam, Summer 2020!

Poor Mama quail lost her babies in a storm! Luckily, they are all okay, just a little lost and scared. Collect the babies and bring them to safety! 

Use arrow keys or wasd to move around, esc to exit the game. You can "glide" by holding the jump button after jumping. 

This is just a demo created for the game jam, so there isn't much in it. Just a little proof of concept really. If you want to see how I got here, check out my devlogand my Trello pagefor the game!
